text: No employer shall discharge an employee for the reason that a creditor of the employee has subjected or attempted to subject unpaid earnings of the employee to garnishment or like proceedings directed to the employer for the purpose of paying a judgment.

title.text: Particular Actions, Proceedings and Matters. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Attachment and Garnishment of Wages, Etc. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: No discharge from employment for garnishment.
